document_data.caption: A map showing the Archipelago of Altumbel south of Urbryur.
document_data.name: Archipelago of Altumbel
document_data.source: [[Sea of Fallen Stars (sourcebook)|Sea of Fallen Stars]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''Archipelago of Altumbel''' was a collection of islands off the coast of [[Altumbel]], on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. The islands were composed of coral and rock, and primarily contained fishing villages. There were numerous wizard towers on the islands, some of which were disused and some of which were still in use. Pirates also occupied the archipelago.

Islands.Shamandra:
{{main|Shamandra}}
The third largest island in the archipelago.
Islands.Stolys:
{{main|Stolys}}
The second largest island in the archipelago.
Islands.Thonn's Fist:
{{main|Thonn's Fist}}
The largest of the islands, also known as Vosos.
